thread.title: Joe Hayes

author: Joe Hayes
title: Joe Hayes
text: What can I say?! Best customer service of any online retailer that I've ever encountered. Simon replies on Facebook Messenger almost instantly and never more than an hour, even at the weekends!! Had to return a grasshopper on a Monday morning. By Thursday morning I had a replacement grasshopper in my hands (plus some free goodies!!). And I'm in Ireland. It would be a 2 day turnaround elsewhere I'd say. Can't praise or recommend Vaposhop enough. Simply the best ðŸ˜Ž
